question: Which countryâ€™s passport is declared the most powerful, as per the Henley Passport Index?
explanation:
As per the recent report of the Henley Passport Index, Japanese passport has retained the rank of topmost powerful passport in the world.
With the Japanese passport, one can travel to as many as 191 countries by visa-free or visa-on-arrival mode. India ranks 85th in the list while Syria, Iraq and Afghanistan remain the the countries with the worst passport to hold.
